document.full_text: mr. ohga, the president and chairman from 1982 to 1995, had a love of music that shaped the development of the compact disc and transformed sony into a global empire.
document.title: norio ohga, who led sony's push into music and movies, dies at 81
lines_and_colors: mr. ohga, the president and chairman from 1982 to 1995, had a love of music that shaped the development of the compact disc and transformed sony into a global empire.
